public_banners.147.subtitle: The art of transformation
public_banners.147.title: Beauty salon in Dubai
public_faq.1.answer: You can sign up for the procedure through the form on our website, by calling, or writing to us on Instagram. We will contact you to confirm your appointment.
public_faq.1.question: How to sign up for the procedure
public_faq.10.answer: Yes, we work 7 days a week.
public_faq.10.question: Do you work on weekends
public_faq.11.answer: Yes, we offer gift certificates for any amount or for specific services. Contact us to obtain a certificate.
public_faq.11.question: Is it possible to give a certificate for services?
public_faq.12.answer: We are located in the center of Dubai. Detailed information on how to get there can be found on the Contacts page.
public_faq.12.question: Where is your salon located?
public_faq.2.answer: We accept payment in cash and cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express). Payment is made after the service is provided.
public_faq.2.question: What payment methods do you accept?
public_faq.27.answer: You can sign up online through the form on our website, by calling or writing to us on WhatsApp, Instagram.
public_faq.27.question: How to sign up for the procedure?
public_faq.28.answer: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule your appointment by giving us at least 24 hours notice. Please notify us of changes in advance.
public_faq.28.question: Can I cancel or reschedule an appointment?
public_faq.29.answer: We use only professional premium materials. All instruments undergo medical sterilization.
public_faq.29.question: What materials do you use?
public_faq.3.answer: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule your appointment up to 24 hours before your scheduled time. If canceled less than 24 hours in advance, a penalty of 50% of the cost of the service may be charged.
public_faq.3.question: Can I cancel or reschedule an appointment?
public_faq.30.answer: Yes, we value your time and can arrange for multiple procedures to be performed simultaneously.
public_faq.30.question: Do you do procedures with 4 hands?
public_faq.31.answer: Our salon is located in a convenient location with a beautiful view and a cozy atmosphere. You will find the exact address in the contacts section.
public_faq.31.question: Where are you located?
public_faq.32.answer: You can sign up via the website or WhatsApp.
public_faq.32.question: How to sign up?
public_faq.33.answer: Yes, we have free parking for customers.
public_faq.33.question: Is there parking?
public_faq.34.answer: We use Luxio, Fedua and other premium brands.
public_faq.34.question: What brands do you use?
public_faq.4.answer: We use only certified premium materials from the world's leading brands. All pigments are hypoallergenic and safe for health.
public_faq.4.question: What materials do you use
public_faq.5.answer: Yes, all our masters have international certificates and regularly take advanced training courses.
public_faq.5.question: Do your craftsmen have certificates?
public_faq.6.answer: Yes, some procedures require preparation. We provide detailed recommendations upon registration.
public_faq.6.question: Is preparation necessary before the procedure?
public_faq.7.answer: Yes, each procedure has its own contraindications. Main: pregnancy, lactation, acute inflammatory processes, blood diseases, oncology. Before the procedure, consultation with a specialist is required.
public_faq.7.question: Are there any contraindications to the procedures?
public_faq.8.answer: Yes, we guarantee the quality of all our services. If you are not satisfied with the result, contact us within 7 days and we will find a solution.
public_faq.8.question: Do you provide a guarantee for services
public_faq.9.answer: Yes, we have a cumulative loyalty program. After each visit you receive bonuses that can be used to pay for future visits.
public_faq.9.question: Do you have a loyalty program

public_reviews.1.text: Amazing salon! The masters are true professionals. I did permanent eyebrow makeup, the result exceeded all expectations. Very natural and beautiful.
public_reviews.2.text: The best beauty salon in Dubai!
public_reviews.28.text: Amazing salon! The masters are true professionals. The manicure lasts more than 3 weeks, and the result exceeds all expectations. I'll definitely be back!
public_reviews.29.text: I had my hair dyed and the results were simply gorgeous! The color turned out exactly how I wanted. Thanks for your professionalism!
public_reviews.3.text: I've been going here for manicures and pedicures for a year now. Always perfectly clean, sterile and high quality. I recommend it to all my friends!
public_reviews.32.text: Great service! I made an appointment online in a couple of minutes, arrived on time, without waiting. The master did everything quickly and efficiently. Very pleased!
public_reviews.34.text: The best salon in Dubai! The masters are super.
public_reviews.4.text: Incredible service. I had a facial and my skin is glowing. I will definitely be back!

users.671.bio: Gulya is a recognized expert in the field of manicure, depilation and professional facial care with 8 years of experience. Through her mastery of aesthetic transformation techniques and attention to detail, she creates flawless images, providing each client with the highest level of care and professional approach.
users.671.position: Master of manicure and depilation, facial care
users.672.bio: Jennifer embodies the talent of a multidisciplinary professional. She masterfully performs both basic and complex beauty procedures, providing a comprehensive and harmonious approach to your transformation.
users.673.bio: Mestan is a unique master who combines the talent of a top stylist and a permanent makeup expert. Her deep knowledge allows you to create complete and flawless images that highlight your individuality.
users.673.position: Hair Stylist and Permanent Makeup Artist
users.674.bio: Simo is our salon's leading expert in the field of premium care and complex coloring. His many years of international experience and proprietary techniques guarantee results of the highest class.
users.675.bio: Lyazat is a true perfectionist in the nail service industry. With impeccable taste and attention to detail, she creates the perfect manicure and pedicure, taking care of the aesthetics and health of your hands.
users.gulcehre.bio: Gulya is a recognized expert in the field of manicure, depilation and professional facial care with 8 years of experience. Through her mastery of aesthetic transformation techniques and attention to detail, she creates flawless images, providing each client with the highest level of care and professional approach.
users.gulcehre.position: Master of manicure and depilation, facial care
users.jennifer.bio: Jennifer embodies the talent of a multidisciplinary professional. She masterfully performs both basic and complex beauty procedures, providing a comprehensive and harmonious approach to your transformation.
users.lyazat.bio: Lyazat is a true perfectionist in the nail service industry. With impeccable taste and attention to detail, she creates the perfect manicure and pedicure, taking care of the aesthetics and health of your hands.
users.mestan.bio: Mestan is a unique master who combines the talent of a top stylist and a permanent makeup expert. Her deep knowledge allows you to create complete and flawless images that highlight your individuality.
users.mestan.position: Hair Stylist and Permanent Makeup Artist
users.sabri.bio: Simo is our salon's leading expert in the field of premium care and complex coloring. His many years of international experience and proprietary techniques guarantee results of the highest class.
